# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but its true worth lies in bringing unparalleled benefits and experiences to its owner. Given its significance, we believe it's only fair to extend this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value. We are confident that once you experience the product, you'll understand why we're so passionate about it. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
